original_text: You cannot shout commands to the clouds. You cannot tell them to pour down their rain, so that a flood of water covers you. You cannot shout commands to the clouds. You cannot tell them to pour down their rain, so that a flood of water covers you. You cannot shout commands to the clouds. You cannot tell them to pour down their rain, so that a flood of water covers you. You cannot shout commands to the clouds.
korean_text: 네가 목소리를 구름에까지 높여 넘치는 물이 네게 덮이게 하겠느냐

sentences.original_text: You cannot shout commands to the clouds
sentences.korean_translation: 당신은 구름에게 명령을 외칠 수 없습니다

sentences.original_text: You cannot tell them to pour down their rain
sentences.korean_translation: 당신은 그들에게 비를 내리라고 말할 수 없습니다

sentences.original_text: so that a flood of water covers you
